name: Train Bear Repair
description:
Help Oslo, the TRAIN BEAR fix the tracks before the Train reaches the end of the line. 

Use START Button (ENTER Key) to begin game after intro text.
Use ARROW Key to Navigate.
Use A Button (Z Key) (Saw) on the Wood parts AND to answer Yes to Questions.
Use B Button (X Key) (Hammer) on the Metal parts AND to answer NO to Questions.

#GGJ20
#NashGameDev
